body.name: Maxi Health Teen Supreme Hers Vitamins for Teen Girls (120) - Women's Multivitamin for Energy, Immune Boost, Body & Brain Growth - Womens Multi Vitamins Including D3, Iron, Calcium, Digestive Enzyme
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 28 mins
features: TEEN GIRL MULTIVITAMIN - Our specially curated women's multivitamin is designed for girls 12 to 17 and into early adulthood. Contains 32 essential nutrients, teen vitamins and minerals to support with the rapid body and brain growth that occurs during adolescence.

ENERGY & IMMUNITY - Protect your teen girl's immune system and promote healthy active energy and mood for academics, sports and healing. Each serving contains powerful antioxidants that fight free radical damage including: Copper, Zinc, Selenium and more.

METABOLISM SUPPORT - Enjoy key vitamins for women and girls that can help support digestion and a healthy metabolism. This daily womens vitamins formula contains 8 Supergreens and Enzymax Vital Digestive Enzyme to help support digestion and reduce bloating, cramps and stomach discomfort.

SKIN, HAIR & NAILS - The combination of key B vitamins, Vitamin C and Biotin can help teen girls grow beautiful healthy hair, skin and nails. Rapid growth during puberty can deplete nutrition to these important areas, which is why daily supplementation is important.

MIND & BODY - Being a teenager is hard enough. Help support the special young woman in your life with a full nutritional profile designed to support a growing body, active mind and help encourage a positive mood and daily routine. Also available Teen Supreme HIS for teen boys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Multivitamin for Teens!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been taking these vitamins for almost a year & is thriving. This has everything needed for active kids. What it doesn’t have is a sugar coating, artificial flavors or the stupid gummy appeal (it’s a vitamin, not candy).I’ve looked all over to find a multivitamin for teens (without sugar & artificial flavors) and Maxi-Health totally delivers! Just read the label and you’ll see all the good stuff inside.Just a few things to know, this doesn’t have the best taste or smell, it’s all natural and plant based. That being stated, my kid has no problems swallowing them and actually prefers them over the gummies I used to get! She feels more energetic since she’s been taking them.This is great for active teens, especially those who are always on the go! This has all the vitamins and nutrients needed to keep going!If you are looking for a vitamin for your teen, try this one. You won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for teens
reviews.reviewText: I initially got these when my daughter struggled with low energy and exhaustion, especially around “that time of the month”. This multi vitamin provides all the basic vitamins/minerals she needs, and I like that it has some added nutrients for optimal health. Taking her daily dose has definitely helped with her issues, she does feel better physically. The capsules are not overly large, and they are easy to swallow. No taste issues, and we’ve never had any issues with quality control. We get them on subscribe and save, which makes it very easy to keep enough on hand now that my second daughter has reached her teen years, as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Vitamins, Good Value
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying the His and Hers bottles of Maxi Teen for at least a couple of years. My son is 14 and my daughter is 12. I like that they are made with natural ingredients and that they are specialized for the gender of the child. I think the capsules are a reasonable size and my kids have no trouble swallowing them. The capsules don't smell and taste great, but the kids don't really spend a lot of time smelling or tasting them. They just drop the capsule in their mouths and take a drink. As far as the His bottle not matching the product description, I'm pretty sure that's just a misprint. The Hers label matches the description of the His bottle in the advertisement, if that makes any sense.Bottom Line: We're really happy with these vitamins, will continue to buy them, and have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The smell is pungent
reviews.reviewText: These are high-quality vitamins with great ingredients. However, the serving sizes two pills. My daughter has a hard time swallowing pills as it is and taking two of them seems like a heavy load. Also, they reek. The smell is so strong when you open the bottle and put them in your hand, that the scent lingers long after you’ve put them in your mouth. It makes my daughter gag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!! No aftertaste or side effects!
reviews.reviewText: I never leave reviews but this calls for one! I’ve purchased over a dozen kinds of vitamins for my teenage daughter but none like this one. It’s super easy for her to swallow and doesn’t leave the terrible aftertaste. It also doesn’t make her sick to her stomach like a lot of them have. She struggles with hormones out of balance, acne, and overall feeling crummy, not feeling motivated to be active. Her doctor said try a good multivitamin and it’s been a struggle to find one we like, but this is it!!! She feels and looks so much better. My family has even mentioned how much better, healthier, more active she looks and has been since starting this in November 2021. I wish I could leave 100 awesome reviews because this product needs it! Buy it, you won’t regret it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to swallow no taste
reviews.reviewText: My teenage son takes this without a problem. He is able to swallow without a problem and hasn’t complained of a taste or smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent multi vitamin for teens
reviews.reviewText: By far the best multi vitamin that I have found so far for my teenage boys. They have very healthy diets at home but as everyone with teenagers knows, outside of the home is a different story beyond a parents control! Their hair, skin and nails, energy levels, height and overall health have improved drastically since they have been taking Maxi Teen Supreme. One of my sons has suffered with stomach issues and food sensitivities his entire life and this has been the first multi vitamin that he can keep down and not get severe abdominal pain after taking. They have been very healthy since taking and I would highly recommend this multi vitamin to everyone with teenagers especially with those with food and supplement sensitivities. Very well worth the price. Great product!!!

reviews.reviewText: Taste really bad hard to swallow
